description.value:
Basic Attack

At-Will

Standard

Attack: Melee 3 (one creature)

+30 vs. AC

Hit: 5d8 + 11 damage, and the nightmare beast slides the target 3 squares.

Basic Attack

At-Will

Standard

Attack: Melee 3 (one creature)

+30 vs. AC

Hit: 5d10 + 6 damage, and the target falls prone.

Basic Attack

At-Will

Standard

Requirement: The nightmare beast must not have a creature grabbed.

Attack: Melee 3 (one creature)

+28 vs. AC

Hit: 3d12 + 14 damage, and the nightmare beast grabs the target.

At-Will

Standard

Effect: The nightmare beast makes two melee basic attacks.

Recharge 4-6

Standard

Requirement: The nightmare beast must be bloodied.

Effect: The nightmare beast moves its speed and uses claw twice, tusks once, and bite once, each at any point along the movement. It cannot use more than two attacks on the same target.

Recharge 4-6 ✦ lightning, necrotic

Standard

Requirement: The nightmare beast must not be bloodied.

Attack: Close burst 5 (one or two creatures in the burst)

+28 vs. Reflex

Hit: Ongoing 30 lightning and necrotic damage (save ends). Each creature adjacent to the target takes 20 lightning and necrotic damage.

First Failed Saving Throw: The target falls unconscious (save ends).

At-Will ✦ psychic, teleportation

Move

Effect: The nightmare beast teleports 15 squares to a square adjacent to an unconscious creature it can see. Each unconscious creature adjacent to the beast after it teleports takes 15 psychic damage.

At-Will ✦ fear, psychic

Minor

Attack: Ranged 10 (one unconscious creature)

+28 vs. Will

Hit: 5d10 + 6 psychic damage, and the target cannot make saving throws until the end of its next turn.

Encounter ✦ necrotic

Triggered

Trigger: The nightmare beast misses a target using black lightning.

Attack (Free Action): Close burst 2 (living enemies in the burst)

+28 vs. Fortitude

Hit: 5d8 + 11 necrotic damage.

Effect: If this attack hits at least one creature, the nightmare beast can reroll the attack roll of the triggering attack.
